description: fmswx: Weather and Extended FMS information

type.description: Message type: Value is always fmswx

hexid.description: Transponder Mode S code: 24-bit Mode S transponder code assigned by aircraft registrar. Formatted in upper case hexadecimal.

pitr.description: Point In Time Recovery: Timestamp value that should be supplied to the "pitr" connection initiation command when reconnecting and you wish to resume firehose playback at that approximate position

clock.description: Report Time: POSIX epoch format. Time should be the time generated by flight hardware if possible

lat.description: Latitude: Latitude position value (decimal degrees) of the aircraft when the report was given

lon.description: Longitude: Longitude position value (decimal degrees) of the aircraft when the report was given

alt.description: Altitude: Uncorrected pressure altitude reported by the aircraft in feet.

alt_gnss.description: GNSS Altitude: Reported GNSS altitude (feet above WGS84 ellipsoid)

vertRate.description: Vertical Rate: The aircraft's vertical rate of climb/descent derived from pressure altitude, reported in feet per minute.

vertRate_geom.description: Geometric Vertical Rate: The aircraft's vertical rate of climb/descent derived from GNSS altitude, reported in feet per minute.

gs.description: Groundspeed: The groundspeed of the aircraft, reported in knots.

heading.description: Heading: The direction of the aircraft's ground track, in degrees, relative to true north.

heading_magnetic.description: Magnetic Heading: The aircraft's heading, in degrees, relative to magnetic north.

heading_true.description: True Heading: The aircraft's heading, in degrees, relative to true north.

speed_tas.description: Airspeed: The true airspeed of the aircraft, reported in knots.

mach.description: Mach Number: The mach number of the aircraft.

roll.description: Roll Angle: The roll angle of the aircraft, in degrees. A positive value indicates the right wing is down.

track_rate.description: Track Rate: The rate of change of the ground track, given in degrees per second.

mlat.description: Derived from Multilateration: If this value is present and non-zero, the position was derived from multilateration, not ADS-B, therefore the lat/lon may be less accurate.

wind_quality.description: Wind Quality: The value is 1 if the aircraft is stable (not maneuvering) and 0 if the aircraft is maneuvering. Derived wind data is less reliable if the aircraft is maneuvering.

wind_dir.description: Computed Wind Direction: The computed wind direction, in degrees, relative to true north. The value uses the normal convention where the direction is opposite the wind vector (i.e. wind_dir = 0 means wind from the north).

wind_speed.description: Computed Wind Speed: The computed wind speed, given in knots.

temperature_quality.description: Temperature Quality: The value is 0 if the derived temperature is likely to be inaccurate due to quantization errors, 0 otherwise.

temperature.description: Computed Outside Air Temperature: The computed outside air temperature, given in degrees Celsius.

pressure.description: Computed Static Air Pressure: The computed static air pressure, given in hPa.

facility_hash.description: Reporting facility hash: A consistent and unique obfusticated identifier string for each source reporting positions to FlightAware

facility_name.description: Reporting facility name: A description of the reporting facility intended for end-user consumption. May be a blank string if undefined.
